name: Riboud and fairies
description:
Riboud and fairies is an excellent girl game.
All human characters in the game are drawn by AI, and all of them add dynamic effects.
※ Game features:
● Excellent AI design, late addition dynamic effects.
It has extremely beautiful CG, and it is dynamic, and there are different beauties to collect in sixteen levels! The hand-painted effect is very excellent!
● Beauty CG in boss battle
In the Boss battle, Every level has beautiful dynamic cg!
● hilarious dialogue
The game dialogue is also very funny,! For each level, we have designed several funny dialogues, We believe it will make you feel relaxed and happy.
● Classic horizontal version clearance system
The level design is not difficult, but it is very creative, and each level requires intelligence and technology to pass the level! High playability!
